title: H2 I2 HI - What occurrs as system moves to equil.

content.prompt:
H2(g) + I2(g) â‡„ 2 HI(g)

At 450oC, 2.0 moles each of H2(g), I2(g), and HI(g) are combined in a 1.0 L rigid container. The value of Kc at 450oC is 50. Which of the following will occur as the system moves toward equilibrium?

choices.label: No net reaction will occur, because the number of molecules is the same on both sides of the equation.

skill.text: 6.D: Provide reasoning to justify a claim using chemical principles or laws, or using mathematical justification.
